trans-unit.source: A timer that is integrated into the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> queue which is processed at a specified interval of time and at a specified priority.
trans-unit.target: 集成到一个计时器<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>在指定时间间隔和指定的优先级处理的队列。

trans-unit.source: The DispatcherTimer is reevaluated at the top of every <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> loop.
trans-unit.target: DispatcherTimer 进行重新计算顶部的每个<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>循环。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Timers are not guaranteed to execute exactly when the time interval occurs, but they are guaranteed to not execute before the time interval occurs.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行的确切时间发生的时间间隔，但可确保不执行的时间间隔发生之前，不保证都计时器。

trans-unit.source: This is because DispatcherTimer operations are placed on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> queue like other operations.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为 DispatcherTimer 操作放在<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>队列与其他操作一样。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: When the DispatcherTimer operation executes is dependent on the other jobs in the queue and their priorities.
trans-unit.target: DispatcherTimer 操作执行时所依赖的其他作业在队列和其优先级。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName> is used in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application, it is worth noting that the <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName> runs on a different thread then the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName>中使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]应用程序，它是值得注意<xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName>一个不同的线程上运行则[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]线程。</xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In order to access objects on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread, it is necessary to post the operation onto the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread using <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问对象上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]线程，它是发布到该操作所需<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]线程使用<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Reasons for using a DispatcherTimer opposed to a <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName> are that the DispatcherTimer runs on the same thread as the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> and a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> can be set on the DispatcherTimer.
trans-unit.target: 使用而不是 DispatcherTimer 原因<xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName>DispatcherTimer 在同一个线程运行的是<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>和<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>可针对 DispatcherTimer 设置。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A DispatcherTimer will keep an object alive whenever the object's methods are bound to the timer.
trans-unit.target: DispatcherTimer 将使对象处于活动状态时对象的方法绑定到计时器。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> runs on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the current thread at <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> priority.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>在上运行<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>在当前线程的<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>优先级。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher></xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>

trans-unit.source: To specify a different <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, use the following constructor: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>，使用以下构造函数︰ <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher%29?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref> class which processes timer events at the specified priority.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref>处理按指定的优先级的计时器事件的类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> runs on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>在上运行<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>当前线程。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher></xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>

trans-unit.source: To specify a different <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, use the following constructor: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher%29>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>，使用以下构造函数︰ <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher%29> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to invoke the timer.
trans-unit.target: 在其调用计时器优先级。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref> class which runs on the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> at the specified priority.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref>类上指定运行<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>按指定的优先级。

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to invoke the timer.
trans-unit.target: 在其调用计时器优先级。

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher the timer is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 调度程序计时器关联的。

trans-unit.source: dispatcher is .
trans-unit.target: dispatcheris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref> class which uses the specified time interval, priority, event handler, and <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref>类该类使用指定的时间间隔、 优先级别、 事件处理程序和<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The period of time between ticks.
trans-unit.target: 计时周期之间的时间段。

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to invoke the timer.
trans-unit.target: 在其调用计时器优先级。

trans-unit.source: The event handler to call when the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序时调用<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick"></xref>事件发生。

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher the timer is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 调度程序计时器关联的。

trans-unit.source: callback is .
trans-unit.target: callbackis .

trans-unit.source: interval is less than 0 or greater than .
trans-unit.target: interval小于 0 或大于。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Dispatcher property is determined at the creation of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> object.
trans-unit.target: 在创建时确定的调度程序属性<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> property is set to the current <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the time of creation unless a different <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>属性设置为当前<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>时创建的除非不同<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>指定。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 调度程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the period of time between timer ticks.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置计时器刻度之间的时间段。

trans-unit.source: Timers are not guaranteed to execute exactly when the time interval occurs, but they are guaranteed to not execute before the time interval occurs.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行的确切时间发生的时间间隔，但可确保不执行的时间间隔发生之前，不保证都计时器。

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> operations are placed on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> queue like other operations.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>操作不会放置<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>队列与其他操作一样。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> operation executes is dependent on the other jobs in the queue and their priorities.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>操作执行依赖于队列和其优先级中的其他作业。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: The period of time between ticks.
trans-unit.target: 计时周期之间的时间段。

trans-unit.source: The default is 00:00:00.
interval is less than 0 or greater than milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: interval小于 0 或大于毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the timer is running.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示计时器是否正在运行。

trans-unit.source: IsEnabled must be set to `true` for the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: IsEnabled 必须设置为`true`为<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Start%2A> sets IsEnabled to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Start%2A>将 IsEnabled 设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Stop%2A> sets IsEnabled to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Stop%2A>将 IsEnabled 设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the timer is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果计时器处于启用状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Starts the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 启动<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `false` when the timer is started stops the timer.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>到`false`计时器在启动时停止计时器。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `true` when the timer is stopped starts the timer.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>到`true`当停止计时器启动计时器。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Start sets <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 启动组<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>到`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Start resets the timer <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 开始重置计时器<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stops the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 停止<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `false` when the timer is started stops the timer.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>到`false`计时器在启动时停止计时器。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `true` when the timer is stopped starts the timer.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>到`true`当停止计时器启动计时器。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling Stop sets <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 调用停止集<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>到`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a user-defined data object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户定义数据对象。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: The user-defined data.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的数据。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the timer interval has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 计时器间隔已过去时发生。
